name: Slackbot Workout
description: A fun hack that gets Slackbot to force your teammates to work out!

SLACK_CHANNEL_NAME.description: Name of the slack channel you want the bot to work in.

SLACK_URL_TOKEN_STRING.description: Go to https://www.slack.com/apps/A0F81R8ET-slackbot, add a new configuration and set this to the token from the URL - i.e. https://something.slack.com/services/hooks/slackbot?token=<THIS>
